name: Galaxy Gangster 2D Shooter
description:
Welcome to Galaxy Gangster, my 2D shooter project.

I added/modified the following:

  • Environment
  • Enemies
  • Obstacles
  • Music
  • Out of scene UI
  • Added levels with wormhole feature

Special thanks to Bensound.com for audio, Craftpix.net for design UI design help and 1001fonts.com for the obvious.

Created by: Jeannette Maldonado
